name: marble maze hero
description:
Help the sure-footed hero slay the goblins spawning from their camps as quick as you can. The goblins may not have the best balance, but they can still pack a punch! Level up your arsenal as you fight, and make sure you don't run out of health.

Left click to slash your sword when enemies are near. (When unlocked) Right click to shoot arrow. Enemies that fall through the holes will respawn, so try to keep them on the board.

Game for Ludum Dare 49 by Caleb, Devin, Will, Danny. Additional assets listed on the repo page.
